Story / aim:

a 2D, top-down roguelike, where you are a rebel breaking out of a p̶r̶i̶s̶o̶n̶ ̶c̶a̶m̶p̶ ‘correctional detainment centre’ for dissidents and undesirables. You will attempt to liberate other rebels and fight the fash by using your Chakram throwing skills passed down by a sect of resistance fighters. Basically, fight for queer Liberation through defeating the authoritarian state.  

Thanks for reading this far! If you're interested in this premise, feel free to send me a message to let me know, I'm keen to continue this project when I can afford time on it and knowing there are people out there interested is a good incentive :-)
